item.title: 508/525 INT recoloring codes?
item.dc:creator: @schmichael schmichael
item.description:
@schmichael wrote:

Hey everyone,

i have recently added recoloring items via ints, and it shows this code to add in applet sub1:

case 4087:
colorConfig = new short[][] {
{
926,912
},
{
926,500
}
};
class19.recolor(colorConfig);
break;

and i need to know how you get the codes for different colors because i have no idea how, and guess to try and get the color i want would take forever.

Thanks.

Read full topic
